Content:
The Component Gallery

This project is built with [Astro](https://astro.build/). ## 🚀 Quick start 1. **Create .env file** Duplicate the file `.env.example` in the root of the project and call it `.env`. You'll need to add values for `AIRTABLE_BASE_ID` and `AIRTABLE_TOKEN`. **IMPORTANT NOTE:** The full Airtable database this project uses is private, but there’s an example with enough data to get started with here: https://airtable.com/shrSIQXYkS0mo53jY (click the 'Copy base' link in the top right to get your own version). 1. **Install dependencies**
Translation:
组件库

本项目基于 [Astro](https://astro.build/) 构建。 ## 🚀 快速开始 1. **创建 .env 文件** 复制项目根目录下的 `.env.example` 文件并命名为 `.env`。你需要为 `AIRTABLE_BASE_ID` 和 `AIRTABLE_TOKEN` 添加对应的值。 **重要提示：** 本项目使用的完整 Airtable 数据库是私有的，但这里有一个包含足够数据的示例可供入门：https://airtable.com/shrSIQXYkS0mo53jY （点击右上角的“复制数据库”链接即可获得你自己的版本）。 1. **安装依赖**

RowTranslations.originContent: Duplicate the file `.env.example` in the root of the project and call it `.env`. You'll need to add values for `AIRTABLE_BASE_ID` and `AIRTABLE_TOKEN`.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 复制项目根目录下的 `.env.example` 文件并命名为 `.env`。你需要为 `AIRTABLE_BASE_ID` 和 `AIRTABLE_TOKEN` 添加对应的值。

RowTranslations.originContent: **IMPORTANT NOTE:** The full Airtable database this project uses is private, but there’s an example with enough data to get started with here: https://airtable.com/shrSIQXYkS0mo53jY (click the 'Copy base' link in the top right to get your own version).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: **重要提示：** 本项目使用的完整 Airtable 数据库是私有的，但这里有一个包含足够数据的示例可供入门：https://airtable.com/shrSIQXYkS0mo53jY （点击右上角的“复制数据库”链接即可获得你自己的版本）。

Content:
## 🧞 Commands

All commands are run from the root of the project, from a terminal:

| Command                   | Action                                           |
| :------------------------ | :----------------------------------------------- |
| `npm install`             | Installs dependencies                            |
| `npm run dev`             | Starts local dev server at `localhost:4321`      |
| `npm run build`           | Build your production site to `./dist/`          |
| `npm run preview`         | Preview your build locally, before deploying     |
| `npm run astro ...`       | Run CLI commands like `astro add`, `astro check` |
| `npm run astro -- --help` | Get help using the Astro CLI                     |
Translation:
## 🧞 命令

所有命令均在项目根目录的终端中运行：

| 命令                      | 操作                                               |
| :------------------------ | :------------------------------------------------- |
| `npm install`             | 安装依赖                                            |
| `npm run dev`             | 在 `localhost:4321` 启动本地开发服务器              |
| `npm run build`           | 将生产站点构建到 `./dist/`                           |
| `npm run preview`         | 在部署前本地预览构建                                 |
| `npm run astro ...`       | 运行 CLI 命令，如 `astro add`、`astro check`        |
| `npm run astro -- --help` | 获取 Astro CLI 使用帮助                             |

RowTranslations.translatedContent: 所有命令均在项目根目录的终端中运行：

RowTranslations.originContent: All commands are run from the root of the project, from a terminal:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: | `npm run dev`             | 在 `localhost:4321` 启动本地开发服务器              |

RowTranslations.originContent: | `npm run dev`             | Starts local dev server at `localhost:4321`      |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | `npm run build`           | 将生产站点构建到 `./dist/`                           |

RowTranslations.originContent: | `npm run preview`         | Preview your build locally, before deploying     |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | `npm run astro ...`       | 运行 CLI 命令，如 `astro add`、`astro check`        |

RowTranslations.originContent: | `npm run astro ...`       | Run CLI commands like `astro add`, `astro check` |
RowTranslations.translatedContent: | `npm run astro -- --help` | 获取 Astro CLI 使用帮助                             |
